title: Rock Me Slowly
description: Sophie Matthews canâ€™t believe her luck when she is offered her dream job working with hotter than hell rock band, Buried Alive. Can Sophie fight an attraction to Josh the lead guitarist? Can Mickey, the frontman stay away from her? Secrets will be revealed. Trust will be broken. What lengths would you go to, to protect the one you love? A story of lies, betrayal and passion.
author: Dawn Sutherland
